sides.title: Ablative Plating
sides.ability: Before you would suffer damage from an obstacle or from a friendly bomb detonating, you may spend 1 [Charge]. If you do, prevent 1 damage.

sides.title: Advanced SLAM
sides.ability: After you perform a [Slam] action, if you fully executed that maneuver, you may perform a white action on your action bar, treating that action as red.

sides.title: Afterburners
sides.ability: After you fully execute a speed 3-5 maneuver, you may spend 1 [Charge] to perform a [Boost] action, even while stressed.

sides.title: Electronic Baffle
sides.ability: During the End Phase, you may suffer 1 [Hit] damage to remove 1 red token.

sides.title: Engine Upgrade
sides.text: Large military forces such as the Galactic Empire have standardized engines, but individual pilots and small organizations often replace the power couplings add thrusters, or use high-performance fuel to get extra push out of their engines.

sides.title: Hull Upgrade
sides.text: For those who cannot afford an enhanced shield generator, bolting additional plates onto the hull of a ship can serve as an adequate substitute.

sides.title: Munitions Failsafe
sides.ability: While you perform a [Torpedo] or [Missile] attack, after rolling attack dice, you may cancel all dice results to recover 1 [Charge] you spent as a cost for the attack.

sides.title: Shield Upgrade
sides.text: Deflector shields are a substantial line of defense on most starships beyond the lightest fighters. While enhancing a ship's shield capacity can be costly, all but the most confident or reckless pilots see the value in this sort of investment.

sides.title: Static Discharge Vanes
sides.ability: Before you would gain 1 ion or jam token, if you are not stressed, you may choose another ship at range 0-1 and gain 1 stress token. If you do, the chosen ship gains that ion or jam token instead.

sides.title: Stealth Device
sides.ability: While you defend, if your [Charge] is active, roll 1 additional defense die. After you suffer damage, lost 1 [Charge].

sides.title: Tactical Scrambler
sides.ability: While you obstruct an enemy ship's attack, the defender rolls 1 additional defense die.
